verses.verse: And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3947>me<s%>, Take thee a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1549>tablet<s%>, and <S%H3789>write<s%> upon it with the <S%H2747>pen<s%> of a <S%H582>man<s%>, For <S%H4122>Maher-shalal<s%>-hash-baz;

and I will <S%H5749>take<s%> unto me <S%H539>faithful<s%> <S%H5707>witnesses<s%> to <S%H5749>record<s%>, <S%H223>Uriah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3000>Jeberechiah<s%>.

And I <S%H7126>went<s%> unto the <S%H5031>prophetess<s%>; and she <S%H2029>conceived<s%>, and <S%H3205>bare<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%>. Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> unto <S%H7121>me<s%>, Call his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H4122>Maher-shalal<s%>-hash-baz.

For before the <S%H5288>child<s%> shall have <S%H3045>knowledge<s%> to <S%H7121>cry<s%>, My <S%H1>father<s%>, <S%H517>and<s%>, My mother, the <S%H2428>riches<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus<s%> and the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> shall be carried <S%H5375>away<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%>.
And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto me yet <S%H3254>again<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Forasmuch <S%H3282><s%> as this <S%H5971>people<s%> have <S%H3988>refused<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H7975>Shiloah<s%> that <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H328>softly<s%>, and <S%H4885>rejoice<s%> in <S%H7526>Rezin<s%> and <S%H7425>Remaliah<s%>'s <S%H1121>son<s%>;

now <S%H136>therefore<s%>, behold, the Lord bringeth <S%H5927>up<s%> upon them the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H5104>River<s%>, <S%H6099>strong<s%> and <S%H7227>many<s%>, even the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> and all his <S%H3519>glory<s%>: and it shall come <S%H5927>up<s%> over all its <S%H650>channels<s%>, and go <S%H1980>over<s%> all its <S%H1415>banks<s%>;

and it shall <S%H2498>sweep<s%> onward into <S%H3063>Judah<s%>; it shall <S%H7857>overflow<s%> and pass <S%H5674>through<s%>; it shall <S%H5060>reach<s%> even to the <S%H6677>neck<s%>; and the stretching <S%H4298>out<s%> of its <S%H3671>wings<s%> shall <S%H4393>fill<s%> the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of thy <S%H776>land<s%>, O <S%H6005>Immanuel<s%>.

Make an <S%H7489>uproar<s%>, O ye <S%H5971>peoples<s%>, and be broken in <S%H2865>pieces<s%>; and give <S%H238>ear<s%>, <S%H3605>all<s%> ye of <S%H4801>far<s%> <S%H776>countries<s%>: <S%H247>gird<s%> <S%H2865>yourselves<s%>, and be broken in pieces; <S%H247>gird<s%> <S%H2865>yourselves<s%>, and be broken in pieces.

Take <S%H5779><s%> <S%H6098>counsel<s%> <S%H5779>together<s%>, and it shall be brought to <S%H6565>nought<s%>; <S%H1696>speak<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%>, and it shall not <S%H6965>stand<s%>: for God is with <S%H410>us<s%>.

For <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> thus to me with a <S%H2393>strong<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and <S%H3256>instructed<s%> me not to <S%H3212>walk<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of this <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Say <S%H559><s%> ye <S%H7195>not<s%>, A conspiracy, concerning all whereof this <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H559>say<s%>, A <S%H7195>conspiracy<s%>; neither <S%H3372>fear<s%> ye their <S%H4172>fear<s%>, nor be in dread <S%H4172>thereof<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, him shall ye <S%H6942>sanctify<s%>; and let him be your <S%H4172>fear<s%>, and let him be your <S%H6206>dread<s%>.

And he shall be for a <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%>; but for a <S%H68>stone<s%> of <S%H5063>stumbling<s%> and for a <S%H6697>rock<s%> of <S%H4383>offence<s%> to <S%H8147>both<s%> the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, for a <S%H6341>gin<s%> and for a <S%H4170>snare<s%> to the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.
And <S%H7227>many<s%> shall <S%H3782>stumble<s%> <S%H5307>thereon<s%>, and fall, and be <S%H7665>broken<s%>, and be <S%H3369>snared<s%>, and be <S%H3920>taken<s%>.
Bind thou <S%H6887>up<s%> the <S%H8584>testimony<s%>, <S%H2856>seal<s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%> among my <S%H3928>disciples<s%>.
And I will <S%H2442>wait<s%> for <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, that <S%H5641>hideth<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and I will look for <S%H6960>him<s%>.

Behold <S%H3206><s%>, I and the children whom <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H5414>given<s%> me are for <S%H226>signs<s%> and for <S%H4159>wonders<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, who <S%H7931>dwelleth<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%>.

And when they shall <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H1875>you<s%>, Seek unto them that have familiar <S%H178>spirits<s%> and unto the <S%H3049>wizards<s%>, that <S%H6850>chirp<s%> and that <S%H1897>mutter<s%>: should not a <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1875>seek<s%> unto their <S%H430>God<s%>? on behalf of the <S%H2416>living<s%> should they seek unto the <S%H4191>dead<s%>?
To the <S%H8451>law<s%> and to the <S%H8584>testimony<s%>! if they <S%H559>speak<s%> not according to this <S%H1697>word<s%>, surely there is no morning for <S%H7837>them<s%>.

And they shall <S%H5674>pass<s%> through <S%H7185>it<s%>, sore distressed and <S%H7457>hungry<s%>; and it shall come to pass <S%H7456>that<s%>, when they shall be hungry, they shall <S%H7107>fret<s%> <S%H7043>themselves<s%>, and curse by their <S%H4428>king<s%> and by their <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H6437>turn<s%> their faces <S%H4605>upward<s%>:

and they shall <S%H5027>look<s%> unto the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and <S%H6869>behold<s%>, distress and <S%H2825>darkness<s%>, the <S%H4588>gloom<s%> of <S%H6695>anguish<s%>; and into thick <S%H653>darkness<s%> they shall be driven <S%H5080>away<s%>.
